resources.string: Opsionele lang beskrywing van die uitsending. %1$s is beskikbaar. Lengte moet minder as %2$s karakters.
URL wat Lichess sal nagaan vir PGN opdaterings. Dit moet openbaar beskikbaar wees vanaf die Internet.
Begin datum in jou eie tydsone
Optioneel, indien jy weet wanner die geleentheid begin
Skrap die rondte en sy spelle beslis uit.
Skrap alle spelle van hierdie rondte. Die bron sal aktief moet wees om hulle te kan herskep.
Vee beslis die hele toernooi uit, met al sy rondtes en spelle.
Opsioneel: vervang spelername, graderings en titels

string.name: fideFederations
string.comment: A link and heading for a page listing the different federations under FIDE: https://lichess.org/fide/federation

string.name: top10Rating
string.comment: The average rating in the 10 strongest players of a FIDE federation. Example: https://lichess.org/fide/federation/United_States_of_America

string.name: fidePlayers
string.comment: A link and heading for a page listing players who play under FIDE: https://lichess.org/fide

string.name: federation
string.comment: Shows which federation a player belongs to.
